Trade/Device Name(s): Cepheid Xpert MRSA/SA Blood Culture Assay
Specimen Container(s): BD BACTEC Plus Aerobic/F blood culture bottle
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Cepheid Xpert MRSA/SA Blood Culture Assay using real-time PCR for rapid detection of MRSA and SA from positive blood cultures
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic test to detect Staphylococcus aureus and methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus DNA directly from positive blood cultures using the GeneXpert Dx System, as an aid in the detection of MRSA/SA, not intended to monitor treatment.
